mozilla.components.browser.session

Class Session

  • mozilla.components.browser.session.Session

  • public class Session

    Value type that represents the state of a browser session. Changes can be observed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Session.SecurityInfo
      A value type holding security information for a Session.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Session(java.lang.String initialUrl, Session.Source source, java.lang.String id, mozilla.components.support.base.observer.Observable<mozilla.components.browser.session.Session.Observer> delegate)
      Value type that represents the state of a browser session. Changes can be observed.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods
